thread.title: Danielle Lloyd is pregnant with her fourth child and she 'would love a girl'
thread.title_full: Danielle Lloyd is pregnant with her fourth child and she 'would love a girl'

title: Danielle Lloyd is pregnant with her fourth child and she 'would love a girl'
text:
Instagram Danielle Lloyd shares a no makeup selfie 
"With three boys already, Danielle would love a little girl, but she and Michael will be happy either way," they told The Sun. 
They added: "The baby is due around June, which is very exciting. 
"And after all the anguish Danielle has been through in recent months — ever since Jamie went on CBB — it’s nice for her to be able to focus on the future." 
INSTAGRAM MUM OF THREE- Danielle already has three sons and would love a girl Sexiest mums in showbiz Sunday, 15th March 2015 Happy Mother's day! We take a look at some of the hottest Mums in the world! From Hollywood's Halle Berry to British beauty Myleene Klass and Kim Kardashian, of course! 1 / 18 Jeany Savage Danielle Lloyd 
She told This Morning presenters Holly Willoughby and Phillip Schofield that she had been suffering panic attacks since her ex appeared on Channel 5’s Celebrity Big Brother. 
The ex-glamour model also revealed that people had tried to steal her car after Jamie discussed their finances on the show.
